resources.string: What is happening to you is not normal and you can not ignore it anymore. It is not your fault. It is okay for you to talk to a doctor. It is okay for you to ask for help. You can connect to suporting mom forum e.g Postpartum Support International Online Meetings or go to therapy and do whatever is necessary for your health and that of your family. Postpartum depression and anxiety are temporary and treatable with professional help.
